title: Desire
description: Five short stories of carnal pleasures that will leave you grasping for more!DESIREFlickering at the edges of her mind, until she can’t think of anything else. As the lust inside her builds, she hopes her partner has chosen fleshy pleasures over family duty.I ALWAYS CRY IN THE RAINAt party, ex-lovers meet and sparks fly in a summer storm.THIEFPanic and excitement grow in a hostage’s mind until she learns there’s more to sex than the safe, suburban fucking she’s known.SHINY THINGSAt a surreal carnival of lustful pleasures, the best way to cure your phobia of the rollercoaster is by succumbing to bliss.FINAL BOARDING CALLFrustrated and stuck in transit, with a stranger in a cowboy hat and low slung jeans, Anna knows what she wants and how to get it.
